item.title: Alex add a quote by Alex Sanchez
item.description: "the church should just stay out of people's pants." -- Alex Sanchez

item.title: Alex add a quote by George Eliot
item.description: "It is never too late to be what you might have been." -- George Eliot

item.title: Alex add a quote by James Baldwin
item.description: "Everybody's journey is individual. If you fall in love with a boy, you fall in love with a boy. The fact that many Americans consider it a disease says more about them than it does about homosexuality. " -- James Baldwin

item.title: Alex add a quote by Sophocles
item.description: "One word Frees us of all the weight and pain of life: That word is love." -- Sophocles

item.title: Alex add a quote by Marquesate & Vashtan
item.description: "If I told you that I wanted to spend my days and nights with you, live with you, as my partner, because out there, in Hell, I realised that you mean the world to me? That you are my sanity, my laughter, my lust, my love, my comfort, my day and my night, my heat and cold and everything? If I told you that, would you think that translates to 'convenient'?" -- Marquesate & Vashtan

item.title: Alex add a quote by e.e. cummings
item.description: "Whenever you think or you believe or you know, you're a lot of other people: but the moment you feel, you're nobody-but-yourself." -- e.e. cummings

item.title: Alex add a quote by Amy Lane
item.description: "The scarf could go on and on and on and on, and it could be the harlot-red banner of shame that wrapped him up and kept him warm when the nights grew lonely and cold." -- Amy Lane

item.title: Alex add a quote by Amy Lane
item.description: "You cannot take a person's humanity and then retain your own" -- Amy Lane

item.title: Alex add a quote by Amy Lane
item.description: "Being loved can do marvelous things for a man." -- Amy Lane

item.title: Alex add a quote by Amy Lane
item.description:
"You didn't know that... that my whole world stopped when I first saw you smile."
Crawford to Ben" -- Amy Lane

item.title: Alex add a quote by Amy Lane
item.description: "Well, sometimes small dreams had grandeur, he thought with dignity. Sometimes, the small dreams were all a person needed to live." -- Amy Lane

item.title: Alex add a quote by Heidi Cullinan
item.description: "[His pain] wasn’t a punishment. It wasn’t a gift. It just was. His pain was his life. It wasn’t all his life was, not always." -- Heidi Cullinan

item.title: Alex add a quote by Heidi Cullinan
item.description: "But what I am done with is waiting for when things are better. I’m done waiting for the pain to be all gone. I’m done trying to keep it at bay." -- Heidi Cullinan

item.title: Alex add a quote by Amy Lane
item.description: "Simple is good," he said. "I've lived through complicated. Complicated hurts. Simple sustains you. Complicated makes you hungry for simple." -- Amy Lane

item.title: Alex add a quote by Amy Lane
item.description:
"For Christ's sake, Ian, he was stealing your cash! I hope you at least wore a raincoat, you feel me?
Ian blinked. Why would I want a raincoat, Joel? I was having sex.
Joel put his face in his hands, closed his eyes tight, and prayed that when he looked up and opened then Ian would be kidding.
He wasn't" -- Amy Lane
